page.title: 13Holidays on the Canal
page.content: Every year many people enjoy a holiday on the canal. The Shropshire Union Canal runs through Gnosall. To find out what it is like we asked two families. The first family thoroughly enjoyed their holiday and found it just as exciting as they thought it would be. Although they didn't have all the conveniences of home, if they were given the chance they would gladly go again. The second family also enjoyed their holiday and found it even better than they thought it would be. Although the boat was cramped and narrow they still found it quiet and peaceful in the country. They also missed the conveniences of home. They agreed that if they were given the chance they would love another holiday as they thought it was just great fun.
